author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: امروز نه خائف مستور محبوبست و نه ظاهر مشهور باید بحکمت عامل باشند و بخدمت امر مشغول
translation: In this Day, We can neither approve the conduct of the fearful that seeketh to dissemble his faith, nor sanction the behavior of the avowed believer that clamorously asserteth his allegiance to this Cause. Both should observe the dictates of wisdom, and strive diligently to serve the best interests of the Faith.
